verses.verse: And, behold, <S%H2009><s%> there came <S%H935><s%> a man <S%H376><s%> of God <S%H430><s%> out of Judah <S%H3063><s%> by the word <S%H1697><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%> to Bethel: <S%H1008><s%> and Jeroboam <S%H3379><s%> stood <S%H5975><s%> by the altar <S%H4196><s%> to burn <S%H6999><s%> incense. <S%H6999><s%>

And he cried <S%H7121><s%> against <S%H5921><s%> the altar <S%H4196><s%> in the word <S%H1697><s%> of the LORD, <S%H3068><s%> and said, <S%H559><s%> O altar, <S%H4196><s%> altar, <S%H4196><s%> thus <S%H3541><s%> said <S%H559><s%> the LORD; <S%H3068><s%> Behold, <S%H2009><s%> a child <S%H1121><s%> shall be born <S%H3205><s%> to the house <S%H1004><s%> of David, <S%H1732><s%> Josiah <S%H2977><s%> by name; <S%H8034><s%> and on you shall he offer <S%H2076><s%> the priests <S%H3548><s%> of the high <S%H1116><s%> places that burn <S%H6999><s%> incense <S%H6999><s%> on you, and men's <S%H120><s%> bones <S%H6106><s%> shall be burnt <S%H8313><s%> on you.

And he gave <S%H5414><s%> a sign <S%H4159><s%> the same <S%H1931><s%> day, <S%H3117><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%> This <S%H2088><s%> is the sign <S%H4159><s%> which <S%H834><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> has spoken; <S%H1696><s%> Behold, <S%H2009><s%> the altar <S%H4196><s%> shall be rent, <S%H7167><s%> and the ashes <S%H1880><s%> that are on it shall be poured <S%H8210><s%> out.

And it came <S%H1961><s%> to pass, when king <S%H4428><s%> Jeroboam <S%H3379><s%> heard <S%H8085><s%> the saying <S%H1697><s%> of the man <S%H376><s%> of God, <S%H430><s%> which <S%H834><s%> had cried <S%H7121><s%> against <S%H5921><s%> the altar <S%H4196><s%> in Bethel, <S%H1008><s%> that he put <S%H7971><s%> forth <S%H7971><s%> his hand <S%H3027><s%> from the altar, <S%H4196><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%> Lay hold <S%H8610><s%> on him. And his hand, <S%H3027><s%> which <S%H834><s%> he put <S%H7971><s%> forth <S%H7971><s%> against <S%H5921><s%> him, dried <S%H3001><s%> up, so that he could <S%H3201><s%> not pull <S%H7725><s%> it in again <S%H7725><s%> to him.

The altar <S%H4196><s%> also was rent, <S%H7167><s%> and the ashes <S%H1880><s%> poured <S%H8210><s%> out from the altar, <S%H4196><s%> according to the sign <S%H4159><s%> which <S%H834><s%> the man <S%H376><s%> of God <S%H430><s%> had given <S%H5414><s%> by the word <S%H1697><s%> of the LORD. <S%H3068><s%>

And the king <S%H4428><s%> answered <S%H6030><s%> and said <S%H559><s%> to the man <S%H376><s%> of God, <S%H430><s%> Entreat <S%H2470><s%> now <S%H4994><s%> the face <S%H6440><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%> your God, <S%H430><s%> and pray <S%H6419><s%> for me, that my hand <S%H3027><s%> may be restored <S%H7725><s%> me again. <S%H7725><s%> And the man <S%H376><s%> of God <S%H430><s%> sought <S%H2470><s%> the LORD, <S%H3068><s%> and the king's <S%H4428><s%> hand <S%H3027><s%> was restored <S%H7725><s%> him again, <S%H7725><s%> and became <S%H1961><s%> as it was before. <S%H7223><s%>

And the king <S%H4428><s%> said <S%H1696><s%> to the man <S%H376><s%> of God, <S%H430><s%> Come <S%H935><s%> home <S%H1004><s%> with me, and refresh <S%H5582><s%> yourself, and I will give <S%H5414><s%> you a reward. <S%H4991><s%>

And the man <S%H376><s%> of God <S%H430><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to the king, <S%H4428><s%> If <S%H518><s%> you will give <S%H5414><s%> me half <S%H2677><s%> your house, <S%H1004><s%> I will not go <S%H935><s%> in with you, neither <S%H3808><s%> will I eat <S%H398><s%> bread <S%H3899><s%> nor <S%H3808><s%> drink <S%H8354><s%> water <S%H4325><s%> in this <S%H2088><s%> place: <S%H4725><s%>

For so <S%H3651><s%> was it charged <S%H6680><s%> me by the word <S%H1697><s%> of the LORD, <S%H3068><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%> Eat <S%H398><s%> no <S%H3808><s%> bread, <S%H3899><s%> nor <S%H3808><s%> drink <S%H8354><s%> water, <S%H4325><s%> nor <S%H3808><s%> turn <S%H7725><s%> again <S%H7725><s%> by the same way <S%H1870><s%> that you came. <S%H1980><s%>
So he went <S%H3212><s%> another <S%H312><s%> way, <S%H1870><s%> and returned <S%H7725><s%> not by the way <S%H1870><s%> that he came <S%H935><s%> to Bethel. <S%H1008><s%>

Now there dwelled <S%H3427><s%> an old <S%H2205><s%> prophet <S%H5030><s%> in Bethel; <S%H1008><s%> and his sons <S%H1121><s%> came <S%H935><s%> and told <S%H5608><s%> him all <S%H3605><s%> the works <S%H4639><s%> that the man <S%H376><s%> of God <S%H430><s%> had done <S%H6213><s%> that day <S%H3117><s%> in Bethel: <S%H1008><s%> the words <S%H1697><s%> which <S%H834><s%> he had spoken <S%H1696><s%> to the king, <S%H4428><s%> them they told <S%H5608><s%> also to their father. <S%H1><s%>

And their father <S%H1><s%> said <S%H1696><s%> to them, What <S%H335><s%> <S%H2088><s%> way <S%H1870><s%> went <S%H1980><s%> he? For his sons <S%H1121><s%> had seen <S%H7200><s%> what <S%H834><s%> way <S%H1870><s%> the man <S%H376><s%> of God <S%H430><s%> went, <S%H1980><s%> which <S%H834><s%> came <S%H935><s%> from Judah. <S%H3063><s%>

And he said <S%H559><s%> to his sons, <S%H1121><s%> Saddle <S%H2280><s%> me the ass. <S%H2543><s%> So they saddled <S%H2280><s%> him the ass: <S%H2543><s%> and he rode <S%H7392><s%> thereon, <S%H5921><s%>

And went <S%H3212><s%> after <S%H310><s%> the man <S%H376><s%> of God, <S%H430><s%> and found <S%H4672><s%> him sitting <S%H3427><s%> under <S%H413><s%> <S%H478><s%> an oak: <S%H424><s%> and he said <S%H559><s%> to him, Are you the man <S%H376><s%> of God <S%H430><s%> that came <S%H935><s%> from Judah? <S%H3063><s%> And he said, <S%H559><s%> I am.
Then he said <S%H559><s%> to him, Come <S%H3212><s%> home <S%H1004><s%> with me, and eat <S%H398><s%> bread. <S%H3899><s%>

And he said, <S%H559><s%> I may <S%H3201><s%> not return <S%H7725><s%> with you, nor go <S%H935><s%> in with you: neither <S%H3808><s%> will I eat <S%H398><s%> bread <S%H3899><s%> nor <S%H3808><s%> drink <S%H8354><s%> water <S%H4325><s%> with you in this <S%H2088><s%> place: <S%H4725><s%>

For it was said <S%H1697><s%> to me by the word <S%H1697><s%> of the LORD, <S%H3068><s%> You shall eat <S%H398><s%> no <S%H3808><s%> bread <S%H3899><s%> nor <S%H3808><s%> drink <S%H8354><s%> water <S%H4325><s%> there, <S%H8033><s%> nor <S%H3808><s%> turn <S%H7725><s%> again <S%H7725><s%> to go <S%H3212><s%> by the way <S%H1870><s%> that you came. <S%H1980><s%>

He said <S%H559><s%> to him, I am a prophet <S%H5030><s%> also <S%H1571><s%> as you are; and an angel <S%H4397><s%> spoke <S%H1696><s%> to me by the word <S%H1697><s%> of the LORD, <S%H3068><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%> Bring <S%H7725><s%> him back <S%H7725><s%> with you into <S%H413><s%> your house, <S%H1004><s%> that he may eat <S%H398><s%> bread <S%H3899><s%> and drink <S%H8354><s%> water. <S%H4325><s%> But he lied <S%H3584><s%> to him.
So he went <S%H7725><s%> back <S%H7725><s%> with him, and did eat <S%H398><s%> bread <S%H3899><s%> in his house, <S%H1004><s%> and drank <S%H8354><s%> water. <S%H4325><s%>

And it came <S%H1961><s%> to pass, as they sat <S%H3427><s%> at <S%H413><s%> the table, <S%H7979><s%> that the word <S%H1697><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%> came <S%H1961><s%> to the prophet <S%H5030><s%> that brought <S%H7725><s%> him back: <S%H7725><s%>

And he cried <S%H7121><s%> to the man <S%H376><s%> of God <S%H430><s%> that came <S%H935><s%> from Judah, <S%H3063><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%> Thus <S%H3541><s%> said <S%H559><s%> the LORD, <S%H3068><s%> For as much <S%H3282><s%> <S%H834><s%> as you have disobeyed <S%H4784><s%> the mouth <S%H6310><s%> of the LORD, <S%H3068><s%> and have not kept <S%H8104><s%> the commandment <S%H4687><s%> which <S%H834><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%> commanded <S%H6680><s%> you,

But came <S%H7725><s%> back, <S%H7725><s%> and have eaten <S%H398><s%> bread <S%H3899><s%> and drunk <S%H8354><s%> water <S%H4325><s%> in the place, <S%H4725><s%> of the which <S%H834><s%> the Lord did say <S%H1696><s%> to you, Eat <S%H398><s%> no <S%H408><s%> bread, <S%H3899><s%> and drink <S%H8354><s%> no <S%H408><s%> water; <S%H4325><s%> your carcass <S%H5038><s%> shall not come <S%H935><s%> to the sepulcher <S%H6913><s%> of your fathers. <S%H1><s%>

And it came <S%H1961><s%> to pass, after <S%H310><s%> he had eaten <S%H398><s%> bread, <S%H3899><s%> and after <S%H310><s%> he had drunk, <S%H8354><s%> that he saddled <S%H2280><s%> for him the ass, <S%H2543><s%> to wit, for the prophet <S%H5030><s%> whom <S%H834><s%> he had brought <S%H7725><s%> back. <S%H7725><s%>

And when he was gone, <S%H3212><s%> a lion <S%H738><s%> met <S%H4672><s%> him by the way, <S%H1870><s%> and slew <S%H4191><s%> him: and his carcass <S%H5038><s%> was cast <S%H7993><s%> in the way, <S%H1870><s%> and the ass <S%H2543><s%> stood <S%H5975><s%> by it, the lion <S%H738><s%> also stood <S%H5975><s%> by the carcass. <S%H5038><s%>

And, behold, <S%H2009><s%> men <S%H582><s%> passed <S%H5674><s%> by, and saw <S%H7200><s%> the carcass <S%H5038><s%> cast <S%H7993><s%> in the way, <S%H1870><s%> and the lion <S%H738><s%> standing <S%H5975><s%> by the carcass: <S%H5038><s%> and they came <S%H935><s%> and told <S%H1696><s%> it in the city <S%H5892><s%> where <S%H834><s%> the old <S%H2205><s%> prophet <S%H5030><s%> dwelled. <S%H3427><s%>

And when the prophet <S%H5030><s%> that brought <S%H7725><s%> him back <S%H7725><s%> from the way <S%H1870><s%> heard <S%H8085><s%> thereof, he said, <S%H559><s%> It is the man <S%H376><s%> of God, <S%H430><s%> who <S%H834><s%> was disobedient <S%H4784><s%> to the word <S%H6310><s%> of the LORD: <S%H3068><s%> therefore the LORD <S%H3068><s%> has delivered <S%H5414><s%> him to the lion, <S%H738><s%> which has torn <S%H7665><s%> him, and slain <S%H4191><s%> him, according to the word <S%H1697><s%> of the LORD, <S%H3068><s%> which <S%H834><s%> he spoke <S%H1696><s%> to him.
And he spoke <S%H1696><s%> to his sons, <S%H1121><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%> Saddle <S%H2280><s%> me the ass. <S%H2543><s%> And they saddled <S%H2280><s%> him.

And he went <S%H3212><s%> and found <S%H4672><s%> his carcass <S%H5038><s%> cast <S%H7993><s%> in the way, <S%H1870><s%> and the ass <S%H2543><s%> and the lion <S%H738><s%> standing <S%H5975><s%> by the carcass: <S%H5038><s%> the lion <S%H738><s%> had not eaten <S%H398><s%> the carcass, <S%H5038><s%> nor <S%H3808><s%> torn <S%H7665><s%> the ass. <S%H2543><s%>

And the prophet <S%H5030><s%> took <S%H5375><s%> up the carcass <S%H5038><s%> of the man <S%H376><s%> of God, <S%H430><s%> and laid <S%H3240><s%> it on the ass, <S%H2543><s%> and brought <S%H7725><s%> it back: <S%H7725><s%> and the old <S%H2205><s%> prophet <S%H5030><s%> came <S%H935><s%> to the city, <S%H5892><s%> to mourn <S%H5594><s%> and to bury <S%H6912><s%> him.
And he laid <S%H3240><s%> his carcass <S%H5038><s%> in his own grave; <S%H6913><s%> and they mourned <S%H5594><s%> over <S%H5921><s%> him, saying, Alas, <S%H1945><s%> my brother! <S%H251><s%>

And it came <S%H1961><s%> to pass, after <S%H310><s%> he had buried <S%H6912><s%> him, that he spoke <S%H559><s%> to his sons, <S%H1121><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%> When I am dead, <S%H4191><s%> then bury <S%H6912><s%> me in the sepulcher <S%H6913><s%> wherein <S%H834><s%> the man <S%H376><s%> of God <S%H430><s%> is buried; <S%H6912><s%> lay <S%H3240><s%> my bones <S%H6106><s%> beside <S%H681><s%> his bones: <S%H6106><s%>

For the saying <S%H1697><s%> which <S%H834><s%> he cried <S%H7121><s%> by the word <S%H1697><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%> against <S%H5921><s%> the altar <S%H4196><s%> in Bethel, <S%H1008><s%> and against <S%H5921><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> the houses <S%H1004><s%> of the high <S%H1116><s%> places which <S%H834><s%> are in the cities <S%H5892><s%> of Samaria, <S%H8111><s%> shall surely <S%H3588><s%> come <S%H1961><s%> to pass.

After <S%H310><s%> this <S%H2088><s%> thing <S%H1697><s%> Jeroboam <S%H3379><s%> returned <S%H7725><s%> not from his evil <S%H7451><s%> way, <S%H1870><s%> but made <S%H6213><s%> again <S%H7725><s%> of the lowest <S%H7098><s%> of the people <S%H5971><s%> priests <S%H3548><s%> of the high <S%H1116><s%> places: whoever would, <S%H2655><s%> he consecrated <S%H3027><s%> him, and he became <S%H1961><s%> one of the priests <S%H3548><s%> of the high <S%H1116><s%> places.

And this <S%H2088><s%> thing <S%H1697><s%> became <S%H1961><s%> sin <S%H2403><s%> to the house <S%H1004><s%> of Jeroboam, <S%H3379><s%> even to cut <S%H3582><s%> it off, and to destroy <S%H8045><s%> it from off the face <S%H6440><s%> of the earth. <S%H127><s%>
